animationSpeedLimitReached.value: Animation speed limit reached! Current animation speed reduced to {{percent}}% normal.

playArea.value:
There is a toolbox of circuit elements on the left, and a construction area in the center, where
  you can connect circuit elements to form a circuit. On the right, there is another toolbox with 
  sensors you can 
  use to measure properties like voltage and current.

controlArea.value:
{ $advancedControls ->
  [present] Show the current as the flow of electrons or conventional current. Show labels or values on circuit 
              elements. Additionally, change wire resistivity, battery internal resistance, or add real light bulbs 
              to the circuit element toolbox.
  *[absent] Show the current as the flow of electrons or conventional current. Show labels or values on circuit elements.
}

currentDetails.value: Currently, no circuit elements are in the construction area.

interactionHint.value: Add circuit elements to the construction area, and connect them to begin. Note, you must include at least one Wire in order to connect a circuit.

vertexSplit.value:
{ $connectionCount ->
  [one] { $vertexName } split into one new connection.
  *[other] { $vertexName } split into { $connectionCount } new connections.
}

lightBulbState.value:
{ $state ->
  [off] { $elementName } is now off.
  [dim] { $elementName } glows dimly.
  [steady] { $elementName } glows steadily.
  *[bright] { $elementName } shines brightly.
}

componentValueChange.value:
{ $type ->
  [battery] { $elementName } voltage changed from { $oldValue } to { $newValue } volts.
  [resistor] { $elementName } resistance changed from { $oldValue } to { $newValue } ohms.
  *[lightBulb] { $elementName } resistance changed from { $oldValue } to { $newValue } ohms.
}

accessibleHelpText.value: Grab a circuit element to create it in the construction area.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Real light bulbs added to circuit element toolbox.

accessibleContextResponseUnchecked.value: Real light bulbs removed from circuit element toolbox.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value:
{ $currentType ->
  [electrons] Electron flow shown in circuit.
  *[conventional] Conventional current arrows shown in circuit.
}

accessibleContextResponseUnchecked.value:
{ $currentType ->
  [electrons] Electron flow hidden in circuit.
  *[conventional] Conventional current arrows hidden in circuit.
}

accessibleContextResponse.value: Current animation shows electrons moving through the circuit.
Current animation shows conventional current arrows.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Toolbox labels shown under circuit elements.

accessibleContextResponseUnchecked.value: Toolbox labels hidden under circuit elements.

accessibleContextResponseChecked.value: Circuit element values shown on each component.

accessibleContextResponseUnchecked.value: Circuit element values hidden on circuit elements.

accessibleHelpText.value: Select the view type for circuit elements
Show the circuit elements like they would look in real life.

accessibleContextResponse.value: Circuit elements displayed with lifelike appearance.

accessibleHelpText.value: Show the circuit elements like they would look in a schematic circuit diagram.

accessibleContextResponse.value: Circuit elements displayed with schematic symbols.

accessibleHelpText.value: Drag this tool to the circuit to create a new { a11y_circuitElement_accessibleName }.

label.value: Add focused tool to construction area

labelInnerContent.value: Press Space or Enter to drop the selected component into the circuit.
Press Space or Enter to begin connecting from the focused junction.
Use arrow keys to move grabbed junction to different attachment choices.
Press Space or Enter again to complete the connection, or to detach.
